document.topic_text: 1 hit(s) Profile Account Executive, Ad Sales & Sponsorship','FNG0005375','Americas-US-CA-Los Angeles','!*!Fox Sports West & Prime Ticket is currently looking for an Account Executive with strong knowledge of the Southern California ad buying community to drive ad sales and sponsorships. This role reports to the Local Sales Manager and is based in Los Angeles, CA.ResponsibilitiesProspects and develops working relationships in the ad buying community. Utilizes integration concepts to develop regional sports marketing programs and create and deliver compelling presentations.Maintains existing relationships through stewardship of accounts, entertaining, presentations and overseeing pre-emptions and make-goods.Provides information to the Sales Planner and Sales Assistant in order to ensure generation of reports regarding prospects, pending deals, forecasts, advertiser contacts, specific proposal target lists and expenses.Remains current on industry trends and regional positioning. Works with Sales Planners and Sales Assistants to raise their knowledge level.','!*!This position requires a minimum of 3-5 years experience in advertising sales at a media company or network.Bachelor’s degree is strongly preferred. Strong overall knowledge of the media industry including Digital ad sales is required.Good verbal and written communication skills are necessary, including superior listening skills and the ability to make effective presentations both one-on-one and in group settings. Knowledge of Microsoft Office applications, including Word, Excel and Outlook is required. Proficiency in PowerPoint is necessary.Good interpersonal skills, including the ability to develop and maintain strong business relations is required. Good organizational and project management skills are necessary. The ability to multitask and work effectively in a high pressure environment is also required. Division DescriptionFSN produces over 5,000 live local events each year, including more than 3,200 in high definition, making FSN the most prolific producers of HD Sports programming in the country. In addition, FSN televises national sports events and programs, including Pac-10 and ACC basketball and Pac-10 and Big 12 football. FSN is the nation’s leading provider of local sports, serving as the TV home to more than half of all MLB, NHL, and NBA teams through its 19 owned-and-operated regional networks, including FOX Sports Arizona, FOX Sports Carolinas, FOX Sports Detroit, FOX Sports Florida, FOX Sports Houston, FOX Sports Indiana, FOX Sports Kansas City, FOX Sports Midwest, FOX Sports North, FOX Sports Ohio, FOX Sports Oklahoma, FOX Sports South, FOX Sports Southwest, FOX Sports Tennessee, FOX Sports West, FOX Sports Wisconsin, PRIME Ticket, SportSouth, and Sun Sports.We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ','Account Executive, Ad Sales & Sponsorship']); api.
